(Robo, Vehement fired off two energy-signature seeking missiles at Hot Rod 
after he began pursuit of Hot Rod.  I didn't put it in the same post as Uni 
though because he had to talk to his minions, so I understand if you didn't 
see that one)


Unitron/Firestarter:



Unitron's scanners detected the incoming weapons fire and he activated his 
flares, launching two of them at the oncoming energy-signature seeking 
missiles.

"Heh heh." he laughed, doing a talon roll and avoiding the charges, but as he 
did the roll the optic blast struck his relatively unarmored 'underbelly'.  
"Blast it!" he yelled.

---

Firestarter swerved in a U-turn, firing off ten rapid laser blasts at the 
oncoming Maximal, getting ready to turn back around.
